summary: HORN CANNOT BE ACTIVATED QUICKLY OR REPEATEDLY BECAUSE ONLY A VERY SMALL SPOT IN THE AIRBAG/STEERING PAD IS LIVE.  FINDING THE SMALL, UNMARKED SPOT IS IMPOSSIBLE UNDER EMERGENCY CONDITIONS AND DIFFICULT AT ANY TIME.  DEALERS KNOW IT'S A PROBLEM BUT HAVE NO FIX.  COMMON TO ALL SUPER DUTY WITH AIRBAG.*JB
